configuration.name: XSampleProject
configuration.PROGRAM_PARAMS: -cpu pentium3 -machine "xbox,bootrom=$USER_HOME$/Projects/XBox/Xemu/XEMU/Boot ROM image/mcpx_1.0.bin,short_animation" -m 128 -bios "$USER_HOME$/Projects/XBox/Xemu/XEMU/BIOS/Complex_4627v1.03.bin" -drive "index=0,media=disk,file=$USER_HOME$/Projects/XBox/Xemu/XEMU/Pre-built Xbox HDD image/xbox_hdd.qcow2,locked" -drive "index=1,media=cdrom,file=$CMakeCurrentBuildDir$/XBrew.iso" -qmp tcp:localhost:4444,server,nowait -display sdl -device usb-hub,port=3 -device usb-xbox-gamepad,port=3.1 -gdb tcp::1234
